alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 23 at 4:58PM CST until December 23 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN ARMSTRONG...NORTHEASTERN RANDALL...SOUTHWESTERN CARSON AND EASTERN POTTER COUNTIES... At 457 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Lake Meredith to 13 miles northeast of Amarillo to 6 miles northeast of Lake Tanglewood, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Lake Tanglewood, Washburn, Timbercreek Canyon, and Pantex. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
